name: Bestie Wars
description:
To bestie or not to bestie that is the question in this epic break-up game. Win the love games and break up your bestie’s ‘ship so you can walk down the aisle.

They say all’s fair in true love and war. Well, not here! Only one pair can survive to the end…and you better win and get to put on that dreamy wedding outfit. Can you hear those wedding bells?!

But before you get there, you’ll have to try everything in your power to get your best friend to break up with their boo. Sabotage their relationship at every turn and get to the finish.
